body.section: Hierarchy TrueFalseQuestion is a kind of AssessmentResponse

section.title: Description
section.p: This class represents a question that requires a true of false answer. Both the question and the answer are identified. Ideally, the question code would identify the issue or assertion confirmed or denied by the answer.

stentry.p: This attribute represents a response as a boolean (true/false) response to a specific assessment question. If a response is not provided, the null value may be qualified by an ASKU (asked but unknown) null flavor.
